name: POWER_XS_BAT_CHECK_ECORE_ONLY_SCHED_DOMAIN_SERVER
summary: Verify if CPU topology sched_domain name are corrected detected and listed, on ecore only server SKU, there will be no SMT, if the package support multiple L3 cache, it will have die sched_domain, e.g. on SRF-AP, usually there is only one L3 cache per package. CLS: CPUs with the same L2 id, SRF/CWF supports; MC: CPUs with the same LLC (L3) id, SRF/CWF supports
